verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅre kaila aṅgīkāra
āpana-śrī-aṅga-sevāya dila adhikāra

synonyms: tabe—after that; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto Govinda; kaila—did; aṅgīkāra—acceptance; āpana—personal; śrī-aṅga—of the transcendental body; sevāya—in the service; dila—gave; adhikāra—responsibility.
translation: After Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced Govinda and engaged him in the service of His personal body.
